ERROR.passwordMinLength: The password must be longer than 6 characters.
ERROR.firstNameMinLength: The first name must be longer than 2 characters.
ERROR.lastNameMaxLength: The last name must be less than 50 characters.
ERROR.password-not-match: Those passwords didn't match. Please try again.
ERROR.pin-not-match: Those PIN didn't match. Please try again.
ERROR.invalid-email-format: Please enter a valid email. E.g : example@domain.com
ERROR.try-again: Something went wrong. Please try again
ERROR.input-wrong-pin-code: Your PIN code is wrong, please check it again!!
ERROR.same-phone-number: Oops!!! Those phone look likes the same.
ERROR.wrong-password: Oops!!! Please check your password again.
ERROR.phone-regex: Oops!!! Your phone is invalid format, please check it again

BUTTON.send-PIN-to-SMS: Forgot? Send PIN to my phone

MESSAGE.new-user-registration: Welcome to TOG. Please visit the TOG store near you to update your profile
MESSAGE.user-not-complete-profile: Welcome back to TOG. Look like you're not complete your profile. Please come to the nearest TOG store to complete your profile
MESSAGE.reset-password: You recently requested to reset your password. Please check info we've sent to your email to re-new your password
MESSAGE.migrate-user-renew-password: Welcome back to TOG. We've updated our system so because of security, please check your email to change your password
MESSAGE.sign-up-success: Congrats. Your profile updated. Now back to login to sign in
MESSAGE.send-PIN-to-Phone: We've sent a PIN code to your phone. Please check it
MESSAGE.change-phone-confirm: For change phone number, your need to use your PIN code to confirm your change phone number request
MESSAGE.change-phone-success: You have successfully changed your phone number. Please login again with new number
MESSAGE.user-already-complete-profile: Welcome back to TOG. You completed your profile. Please sign in!

how-it-works.title: How it works?
how-it-works.content: Become TOG Premium+ Member for S$20 for a 1-year membership that offers you:
how-it-works.wallet-content: A reward of S$10 in TOG Wallet which can be used for next purchase.
how-it-works.price-content: Enjoy special price for selected products in store.
how-it-works.point-content: Earn Reward Points for every dollar spent in store (2 x Reward Points on your birthday month).

step1.name: Step 1
step1.content: Head down to the Toy Or Game

step2.name: Step 2
step2.content: Approach their friendly staff about claiming your offer.

step3.name: Step 3
step3.content: Enter your mobile number when asked.
